Class ReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
src.services.ReportGenerator
public class ReportGenerator extends Object
Generates reports about accounts and transactions.

    Creates a new report generator.

      public String generateActiveAccountsReport() throws IOException
      Generates a report of all active accounts.
      Returns:
      the filename of the generated report
      Throws:
      IOException - if the report cannot be written

      Generates a report of all closed accounts.
      Returns:
      the filename of the generated report
      Throws:
      IOException - if the report cannot be written

    • generateAccountTransactionSummary

      public String generateAccountTransactionSummary(String accountNumber) throws IOException, InvalidAccountException
      Generates a transaction summary report for an account.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number
      Returns:
      the filename of the generated report
      Throws:
      IOException - if the report cannot be written
      InvalidAccountException - if the account is not found

    • generateTransactionReportByDateRange

      public String generateTransactionReportByDateRange(String accountNumber, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws IOException, InvalidAccountException
      Generates a report of all transactions within a date range for an account.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number
      startDate - the start date
      endDate - the end date
      Returns:
      the filename of the generated report
      Throws:
      IOException - if the report cannot be written
      InvalidAccountException - if the account is not found
